templateOptions.label: ApiKey
templateOptions.description: The ApiKey to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: HistoricalDays
templateOptions.description: The number of days in the past from which the gigs will be imported

templateOptions.label: FutureDays
templateOptions.description: The number of days in the future from which the gigs will be imported

templateOptions.label: CSVMappingFile
templateOptions.description: Specifies the file name (including the path) for the CSV mapping file that contains the CostCenter mapping

templateOptions.label: Delimiter
templateOptions.description: The delimiter used within the CSV mapping file to separate columns, ensuring the file can be parsed and processed correctly
